snippet: Usain Bolt said he would try for a three-peat in the 100 and 200 at the 2016 Olympics, amid speculation that he could switch to the long jump or the 400 for a new challenge.
abstract: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt says he will try for a three-peat in the 100 and 200 at the 2016 Olympics, rather than trying out a new event.
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt said he would try for a three-peat in the 100 and 200 at the 2016 Olympics, amid speculation that he could switch to the long jump or the 400 for a new challenge.

headline.seo: Usain Bolt to Defend 100 and 200 Sprint Titles in Rio
headline.main: Usain Bolt Says He’ll Defend Sprint Titles in Rio
